00020 VhdlPortMap::VhdlPortMap( const QString& name, unsigned int size /*= 1*/ ):
00021 name_(name),
00022 left_(-1),
00023 right_(-1) {
00024 
00025         if (size > 1) {
00026                 left_ = size -1;
00027                 right_ = 0;
00028         }

00052 bool VhdlPortMap::operator==( const VhdlPortMap& other ) const {
00053         if (name_ == other.name_ &&
00054                 left_ == other.left_ &&
00055                 right_ == other.right_) {
00056                         return true;
00057         }
00058         return false;

00061 bool VhdlPortMap::operator!=( const VhdlPortMap& other ) const {
00062         if (name_ != other.name_) {
00063                 return true;
00064         }
00065         else if (left_ != other.left_) {
00066                 return true;
00067         }
00068         else if (right_ != other.right_) {
00069                 return true;
00070         }
00071         return false;
00072 }
00073 
00074 bool VhdlPortMap::operator<( const VhdlPortMap& other ) const {
00075         if (name_.compare(other.name_, Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0) {
00076                 if (left_ == other.left_) {
00077                         return right_ < other.right_;
00078                 }
00079                 else {
00080                         return left_ < other.left_;
00081                 }
00082         }
00083         else {
00084                 return name_.compare(other.name_, Qt::CaseInsensitive) < 0;
00085         }
00086 }
00087 
00088 bool VhdlPortMap::operator>( const VhdlPortMap& other ) const {
00089         if (name_.compare(other.name_, Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0) {
00090                 if (left_ == other.left_) {
00091                         return right_ > other.right_;
00092                 }
00093                 else {
00094                         return left_ > other.left_;
00095                 }
00096         }
00097         else {
00098                 return name_.compare(other.name_, Qt::CaseInsensitive) > 0;
00099         }
00100 }

00109 QString VhdlPortMap::toString() const {
00110         QString result(name_);
00111 
00112         // make sure the if one bound is defined then both are
00113         Q_ASSERT((left_ >= 0 && right_ >= 0) || (left_ < 0 && right_ < 0));
00114 
00115         if (left_ >= 0) {
00116 
00117                 result += QString("(%1 downto %2)").arg(left_).arg(right_);
00118         }
00119 
00120         return result;
00121 }
